name: Customer Service Quality Rubric
description: Evaluates customer service responses for helpfulness, professionalism, empathy, and completeness

criteria.name: Helpfulness
criteria.description: Does the response effectively address the customer's question or problem?

criteria.name: Professionalism
criteria.description: Is the tone professional and appropriate? Is the response well-written?
indicators: Language is professional (not too casual or formal)

criteria.name: Empathy
criteria.description: Does the response show understanding and care for the customer's situation?
indicators: Tone is warm and human (not robotic)

criteria.name: Completeness
criteria.description: Does the response fully address all aspects of the customer's inquiry?
